exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: Flat barbell bench press targeting chest, shoulders, and triceps.

exercises.description: Targets upper chest using an inclined bench.

exercises.description: Compound lower body exercise targeting quads, hamstrings, and glutes.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: Machine exercise targeting quads, hamstrings, and glutes.

exercises.description: Upper body compound exercise targeting the lats and biceps.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.description: Compound exercise targeting multiple muscle groups.

exercises.name: Lateral Raise
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for the lateral deltoids.

exercises.name: Running
